titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of, and expressing the condolences of the Senate on the passing of, Bronislaw Geremek.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7638)
Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
7/29/2008--Introduced.
Honors the life and accomplishments of Bronislaw Geremek and expresses condolences on his passing.
